amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of H.R. 1327 made in order by H. Res. 128 as an original bill for the purpose of amendment.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Rules.

Rules amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. Modification removes a tax provision relating to the Privatization of the Uranium Enrichment Corporation, and makes the effectiveness of the tax provisions contingent upon the adoption of a budget resolution that will project a balanced budget by the year 2002.
On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
